text: yeodeolb jonglyuui gachug-eul yangsig-eulo jusyeoss-euni yang-ui amkeosgwa sukeos-i myeo yeomsoui amkeosgwa sukeos-ila bulsin jadeul-ege illeo galodoe hananimkkeseo neohuiege geumgihasim-i du maliui sukeos-inga animyeon du maliui amkeos inga animyeon du maliui amkeos-ui tae an-e issneun geos-inga neohuiga jinsilham ilamyeon sasillosseo naege malhala
